name: Family Tree: pain
description:
This game is made for festival "Keep calm do games 2", Russia, 2020.

Дневники разработки: https://blogs.keepcalmdogames.org/index.php/2020/11/07/family_tree_pain_fin/

So, keep calm and enjoy my game. Don't hurry.

This surrealistic game is about pandemic. It's not about the fear of getting infected yourself. It's about family. It's about your fear and pain.... and about my author's original 2d style: everything was hand-painted by myself (except letters and stars).

You should walk around, find items for relatives and solve the problem of how to complete all their tasks and grow up the magic tree.

Speak with family. It could help. But don't overdo it.

In this game you will find:

  • Fantasy creatures,
  • Windmill,
  • Beautiful flowers,
  • Jumping in the well,
  • Secret room,
  • Cloudjumping,
  • Waterfall,
  • Cave,
  • Blowning away,
  • Giant eyes,
  • Fat birds,
  • Happy final,
  • Small physical bugs maybe,
  • 3 easter eggs. If you find them, please write a comment here.)

You will feel pain from:

  • "How to keep them alive",
  • Slow moving,
  • My 2d arts,
  • Repeating music,
  • My creepy english.

Estimated time to complete the game ~ 30-40 minutes.

P.S. Little bonus for first winner: code for game in Steam is in the game.

Have a good luck and take care of your family!
